        Sets the value of the showcase color from themes. What this does is dependent on your implementation of ShowcaseDrawer.drawShowcase(Bitmap, float, float, float)
        Specified by:

        Overrides:

                         float x,
                         float y,
                         float scaleMultiplier)
        Description copied from interface: ShowcaseDrawer
        Draw the showcase. How this is performed is up to you!
        Specified by:
        drawShowcase in interface ShowcaseDrawer
        Overrides:
        drawShowcase in class StandardShowcaseDrawer
        Parameters:
        buffer - the bitmap to draw onto
        x - the x position of the point to showcase
        y - the y position of the point to showcase
        scaleMultiplier - a scale factor. Currently unused
